attributes.action: Theresa May to resign with immediate effect for the betrayal of British people.
attributes.background: 17.5 million people voted to leave the EU. Almost a full year later we're still shackled to the corrupt union. Our PM has failed to deliver on the result of the democratic vote and has given into the EU's demands that have no legal standing in law.

rejection.details:
The resignation of a Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of the Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
